about_the_game:
"Bro YuanShen Survivors - In This Destroyed World" is a survivor-like game independently developed by BlueinLife. The game takes place in a fantasy world where people can channel elemental powers thanks to the presence of elemental gods. You'll play as a mysterious character and unlock characters with unique abilities to defeat powerful enemies and find the vanished elemental god – all while uncovering the truth about the "power of the elements" step by step.

yuanshen

This work contains four elements: fire, water, wind, and wood, and through the elemental reaction between the two and two, fancy hanging enemies

brother

Earn gold by killing enemies, and buy various items in the shop to strengthen yourself

survivor

Keep killing monsters, improve skill levels, and unlock special upgrades after reaching the full level.

gacha

Characters are drawn through the Yuanshen Stone, and the selection card pool is guaranteed for 90 shots, and 50% of the selected characters are selected, ensuring that there will be surprises in every draw
